title: Skilled — Independent visa (subclass 885)
summary: This page provides information for people who have already applied for or been granted the Skilled – Independent visa (subclass 885), which is now closed to new applications. It outlines post‑lodgement processes, obligations, decision outcomes, and rights for visa holders. It also includes requirements such as health, character, and updating personal details.

visa_details.description: A permanent residence visa for skilled workers.
visa_details.location_requirement_for_grant: Must be in Australia when the visa is granted.

applicants_information.who_this_is_for: People who applied for a Skilled – Independent visa (subclass 885) before it closed.
applicants_information.family_unit_combined_application: If no decision has been made, members of the family unit can lodge a combined application.

after_applying.acknowledgement: Department will acknowledge receipt of application and documents.
after_applying.case_officer_assignment: A case officer will be assigned to review the application, request more information, request interviews, and make a decision.

factors_that_delay_processing: Need for health checks or chest x-rays

bridging_visas.eligibility: Available if applying for this visa in Australia.
bridging_visas.bridging_visa_a: Allows lawful stay while application is processed.
bridging_visas.bridging_visa_b: Can be applied for to travel outside Australia while waiting for a decision.

health_and_character_requirements.department_contact: Department will contact applicants when health or character documents are required.

debts_to_australian_government.requirement: Applicants must have no outstanding debts or must have arranged repayment before visa grant.

providing_more_information.additional_information_allowed: Applicants can provide more information at any time until a decision is made.
providing_more_information.requests_for_information: The department may ask for more information and applicants must respond by a set date.
providing_more_information.third_party_information: If another person provides information that may affect the application, applicants are usually given an opportunity to comment.

change_of_circumstances.consequences_of_not_updating_passport: Delays at the airport and potential denial of permission to board a plane.

requirements.method: Send a letter or email requesting withdrawal.
information_required: File reference number or client ID or Transaction Reference Number
requirements.signatures_required: All applicants aged 18 years or older must sign the withdrawal request.

notification_includes: When the visa can be used

contact_information.processing_centre: Adelaide General Skilled Migration (GSM) processing centre

visa_holders_information.applicability: For people already granted a Skilled – Independent visa (subclass 885).
visa_holders_information.rights_and_obligations: Explains visa holder rights and obligations.
visa_holders_information.vevo: Visa holders can use VEVO for free to check visa details.

entitlements: Apply for Australian citizenship if eligible
Sponsor eligible relatives for permanent residence
Travel to and from Australia for five years from date of grant (resident return visa required after that)
